content: * **Spell: Fiery Burst - Upon self-detonation, deals area damage triggers de-transform.** This is a manual de-transform attack that can be activated to have Ashen Slumber blow up.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Ashen_Slumber.md', within the main section titled 'Ashen Slumber'.
The content is as follows:
* **Spell: Fiery Burst - Upon self-detonation, deals area damage triggers de-transform.** This is a manual de-transform attack that can be activated to have Ashen Slumber blow up.
